alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:14AM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND DRY FUELS FOR NORTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and dry fuels, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Roberts, Codington, Grant, Hamlin and Deuel. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of strong and gusty winds, low humidity, and cured fine fuels could result in critical fire weather conditions over portions of central and north central South Dakota.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
